Question: Zoe Care CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zoe Care

Product: Zoe Fall

- Wi-Fi-based fall-detection solution
- Uses existing Wi-Fi signals to detect falls and monitor abnormal behavior
- AI analyzes Wi-Fi disruptions to identify falls, breathing irregularities, and other disruptions
- Alerts caregivers via a mobile application
- Data remains local and not stored in the cloud for privacy
- Beta testing in nursing homes, consumer version available by the end of the year
- Subscription service priced at $20-25 per month in the U.S.
- Algorithm integrated into the Wi-Fi receiver for complete privacy
- Potential expansion to remote patient monitoring and chronic disease analysis
- Simple deployment and cost-effective solution for elder care
Summary_cn:
Zoe Care

产品：Zoe Fall

- 基于Wi-Fi的跌倒检测解决方案
- 利用现有的Wi-Fi信号来检测跌倒并监测异常行为
- 人工智能分析Wi-Fi干扰以识别跌倒、呼吸异常和其他干扰
- 通过移动应用程序向护理人员发出警报
- 数据保留在本地，不存储在云端以保障隐私
- 在养老院进行Beta测试，消费版将于年底推出
- 在美国每月订阅服务价格为20-25美元
- 算法已整合进Wi-Fi接收器，完全保护隐私
- 可能扩展至远程患者监测和慢性病分析
- 简单部署和经济实惠的老年护理解决方案
